title: LMS-Integrated Science Education Design: Blended Learning Strategies and Scientific Inquiry Skill Development for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science education theories (hypothesis formulation, experimental design, variable control), experience with digital tools, and understanding of fundamental scientific inquiry processes (observation, measurement, analysis, evidence collection)
context.additional_context: Strengthens pre-service/in-service teachers' ability to design science curricula using LMS. Focuses on integrating scientific inquiry processes (observation, measurement, analysis, conclusion drawing) into digital environments, fostering systematic collection of experimental data and evidence-based conclusion-drawing skills.

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more scientific inquiry modules (including hypothesis formulation, control of independent/dependent variables, experimental data analysis) using advanced LMS features (quizzes, discussion boards, feedback systems), achieve over 80% suitability in peer review and expert evaluation, and implement them in actual classes within four weeks

Learners can analyze LMS log data (gender, academic achievement top 20%/middle 60%/bottom 20%, scientific thinking assessment scores) to design three or more customized educational strategies (content recommendation algorithms, interaction frequency adjustments, evidence-based feedback types) optimized for four learner types and achieve an average of 4 or higher on a 5-point expert panel evaluation scale

Learners can design plans to apply three or more self-regulated learning (SRL) skills (goal setting, self-monitoring, strategy adjustment) using LMS-based formative assessment tools and improve scientific analysis skills (experimental data collection, hypothesis verification, conclusion drawing) to 4 or higher (out of 5) based on a 5-level rubric

resources: LMS Platform (Including Learning Activity Analytics Tools)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
